text: SpreadsheetML is the XML schema for Microsoft Office Excel 2003. The Office 2003 XML Reference Schemas are included in the Microsoft Open Specification Promise, a legal statement concerning unrestricted use of Microsoft intellectual property. ==See also== *Microsoft Office 2003 XML formats *Office Open XML *OpenDocument ==References== ==External links== * XML Spreadsheet Reference * ECMA Office Open XML File Formats overview Category:Computer file formats Category:Technical communication Category:Markup languages
title: SpreadsheetML
